title: Asparagus and Stilton bruschetta
ingredients: ['250g fresh asparagus, trimmed and cut into 1cm pieces', '1 teaspoon olive oil', 'salt and pepper to taste', '300g cherry tomatoes, halved', '4 tablespoons chopped fresh basil', '1 to 2 shallots, chopped', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 garlic cloves, minced', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon pepper', '12 baguette slices, toasted', '75g Stilton, crumbled']
